Trade/Device Name(s): BD Directigen EZ Flu A + B Assay
BD Directigen M EZ Flu A + B Assay
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Directigen EZ Flu A + B Assay, a rapid chromatographic immunoassay to qualitatively detect influenza A and B antigens in respiratory specimens
Indications for Use Summary: Rapid chromatographic immunoassay for direct and qualitative detection of influenza A and B viral antigens from nasopharyngeal washes/aspirates, nasopharyngeal swabs, and throat swabs of symptomatic patients to aid in the diagnosis of influenza A and B infections
